item.title: The Genocide Lie Is Back
item.description: A new resolution condemning Israel is about as marred as the process that produced it.

item.title: The Tariff Power Still Belongs Only to Congress
item.description: Trump lost the case on his tariffs because only Congress has the power to tax.

item.title: President Trump Is Right to Fight European Tech Overreach
item.description: The Old World model of state management must not be permitted to hold back the advance of the freedom-fueled dynamism of the New World.

item.title: Institutionalize the Mentally Ill Homeless
item.description: Forcing people into treatment would raise the ACLU’s hackles, but it’s the only compassionate solution for people who cannot care for themselves.

item.title: Time to Force Putin to the Negotiating Table
item.description: He is clearly trying to play President Trump by talking peace while waging war. He will find that a very dangerous game.
